description:
Introducing Markets.com — The Place To Trade.
Trade a wide range of global markets including Forex, Stocks, Indices, Commodities, Bonds and ETFs with Markets.com. Our app offers an intuitive, user-friendly interface, advanced charting, and powerful tools designed for traders of all experience levels. Manage your trades, monitor market activity, and stay informed to support your trading decisions anytime, anywhere.
 Discover the world of trading with Markets.com. User friendly platform helps to explore Stocks, Indices, Commodities, Currencies,and many more, while  our platform provide charting tools,  analytical tools, . Reliable deposits and withdrawals in accordance with regulatory, order execution based on our Best Execution Policy .

Proud milestone of markets.com:
Trading Volume: $3 Trillion
Users: 4.7M+
Partners: 11,700+
Partner Referrals/Users: 4M+
Commissions Paid: $184M+
Positions Opened: 68M+
 
Trade with markets.com:
●   Order execution in line with regulations.
● Competitive commissions and spreads.
● Low minimum deposit (in line with regulatory standards)
● Industry-leading trading platforms & Free mobile app (multi-language).
● Our platform offers account and trading options suitable for clients executing higher trading volumes.

Why choose Markets.com ?
● Superior Trading Conditions: Trade a vast array of instruments with spreads as low as 0.0 pips and enjoy some of the industry's most competitive commissions. 
● Ultra-Fast Execution: Experience one of the fastest execution times in the industry – averaging just 0.20 seconds, with no requotes.
● Trading Strategies: Trade global financial markets using a range of permitted strategies, in line with applicable regulations. 
● Client Fund Protection: Funds are held in segregated accounts with reputable financial institutions, and Negative Balance Protection is provided for all retail clients.
● Trading Technology: Our platforms incorporate modern tools and features to support informed and order management.
● Responsive Support: Get assistance from our multilingual support team during available service hours
Experience the pinnacle of trading with markets.com – a global leader since 2008. With innovative platforms, advanced charting tools, and dedicated support, we have earned the trust of over 4.7M+ users worldwide. As a top CFDs trading brand operating in multiple jurisdictions, we deliver excellence through cutting-edge technology and a commitment to your success. 
Markets.com operates globally under the following jurisdictions:
 
● Europe (Cyprus) - Safecap Investments Limited, regulated by CySEC under license no. 092/08.
● Africa - Markets South Africa (Pty) Ltd regulated by FSCA under license no. 46860 and licensed to operate as an Over-the-Counter Derivatives Provider (ODP) in terms of the Financial Markets Act no. 19 of 2012.
● Markets International Limited – a company registered in the Saint Vincent and the Grenadines (“SVG”) under the revised Laws of Saint Vincent and The Grenadines 2009, with registration number 27030 BC 2023.
 
Risk warning: Check our website for the percentage (%) of retail investor accounts who lose money when trading CFDs with us. You should consider whether you can afford to take the high risk of losing your money.
